author: beaton
msg: Finish off the deprecation of HttpTestFixture.
GadgetTestFixture now has mocks for almost all of the dependencies anyone
could possibly want.  ServletTestFixture adds a bit of behavior on those
One of the goals here was to avoid situations where a test author could get
confused about which mock they wanted.  We had test cases that used both
ServletTestFixture and GadgetTestFixture, and if you accidentally used
httpFetcher from one instead of the other, your test would fail for mysterious
